name: Frontline Sniper Commando of Dead Fury Mission Ops
name_original: Frontline Sniper Commando of Dead Fury Mission Ops
description:
Desert Army Base Captured by enemy troops ,we need to rescue our soldiers from bunkers,as you are only soldier in contact with base station you must destroy incoming enemy troops and also shoot enemy guards.


Important : Use Rocket Launcher to Destroy Flying Enemy.
